meanings.definition: The quality or state of being radiant.
meanings.sent1: The radiances of the sun brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: The radiances of the stars illuminated the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The radiances of the fireflies made the garden look magical.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had the radiances of a thousand suns.
meanings.sent5: The radiances of the rainbow after the storm were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The amount of light or heat emitted by a source.
meanings.sent1: The radiances from the bonfire kept us warm.
meanings.sent2: The radiances from the light bulb filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The radiances from the oven made the kitchen cozy.
meanings.sent4: The radiances from the campfire danced in the night.
meanings.sent5: The radiances from the candles created a romantic atmosphere.
